name: 陳志遠
objective:
本課程主題將集中於材料、光電技術與該些技術之關鍵專利檢索、布局策略研討，學生除了可學習材料科學與光電科技的基礎知識外，亦可瞭解到專利如何運用在這些相關產業上，課程內容包括: (1)材料科學原理，(2)材料科技產業介紹，(3)材料產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析、(4)光電工程技術、(5)光電科技產業分析、(6)光電產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析。
============================================================
The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1) material science principle, (2) material technology industry analysis, (3) material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5) electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.
